entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending early this evening then cloudy and 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023
